sport.name: Soccer
sport.description: A team sport played with a spherical ball between two teams of eleven players.

sport.name: Basketball
sport.description: A team sport where two teams, usually of five players each, oppose each other on a rectangular court.

sport.name: Tennis
sport.description: A racket sport that can be played individually against a single opponent or between two teams of two players each.

sport.name: Swimming
sport.description: An individual or team racing sport that requires the use of one's entire body to move through water.

sport.name: Cricket
sport.description: A bat-and-ball game played between two teams of eleven players on a circular or oval field.
